*This software is a test development software similar to the guitar club, 
 which is used to simulate the search and display function of the score, 
 plus the popular science connection for musical instrument purchase.

 
1.Click the picture on the 'Buy instrument' on the left to jump to a page to search for scores.
 
2. Enter the name of the score you want to find.
 
3.select the instrument you want to play.
 
4.Click 'Display' then jump to result page.
 
5.If you want to learn about the guitars on the market, you can return to the homepage and click on the shopping cart picture on the right.
